slides.slideTitle: Shop Anything from China with Ease
slides.slideDescription: Register once, get your China address, and start shopping from any website.
We collect your parcels and send them in one box to save time and cost.
View your packages, track them in real time, and get an upfront estimate.

features.description1: Register once, get your China address, and start shopping from any website with ease.
features.description2: We consolidate your parcels into one box to reduce costs and speed up delivery.
features.description3: Track your packages every step of the way and get an upfront price estimate before payment.
features.description4: Our support team is available around the clock to assist you with any inquiries.
